title: kanaka sabhaiyai
sahitya:
kanaka sabhaiyaik-kaNDa piragOr kAkSiyum uNdO tillaik-


anupallavi

  shivakAmi nEshan naTarAjan tiru naTampuri cidambaram shenru


caraNam    pAmbum puliyum Ananda veLLam amizhndhu kuLikka
pankajan mAlin tALam maddaLam muzhanga pArvati
pakkam ninru kaNDu magizha bhaktargaL munivar kaLikka
bhava-nOi marundu kuncitapadam tandOm enrADum
